page.title: 09Rugby High School,Rugby.
page.content: Rugby High is a grammer school for girls between 12-18.It has about 650 girls and about 170 of these are in the sixth form.90 new girls are admitted each September.An examination has to be passed to attend the school. Girls from other schools can go to Rugby High in the sixth form.Girls are divided alphabetically into classes of 30.A general curriculum is followed until the end of the third year when examination subjects chosen Some girls leave at the end of the fifth year,most of them move onto further education.Others stay to take "A" levels in the sixth forms.All the girls exept the sixth form wear uniform which is navy blue and light blue.
